name: Fourfold Mirage
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You blast disorienting lights through a 60 foot cone, causing all creatures in range that can see it to make a Constitution saving throw. On a failure, they take 4d6 radiant damage and see four copies of every creature while they remain affected by the spell. On a success, they take half damage and no other effect.

A creature that is seeing multiple creatures must roll 1d20 when targeting any creature with an attack or spell. On a roll of 15 or lower, the attack or spell is aimed at a mirage and harmlessly misses. They can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of their turns, ending the effect early on a success.
